ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Expansion Spells (Unconfirmed)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Shanti Astangi [mailto:zealpath@telus.net] Sent: March 1, 2000 4:21 PM To: shadowknight@onelist.com Subject: [shadowknight] Expansion Spells
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Shanti Astangi [mailto:zealpath@...]
Sent: March 1, 2000 4:21 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] Expansion Spells (Unconfirmed)


From: "Shanti Astangi" <zealpath@...>

Here is a "beta" list of the spells sks will be able to use at levels 51-60.
Looks great if you ask me, check it out at
http://eq.castersrealm.com/kunark/spells/shadowknight.asp

Another cool thing is that I believe Spirit Tap also steals strength,
although I could be wrong.
Regardless of when, I think it's nice that we're actaully getting Banshee
Aura and Boil Blood back, and those pets look like they might actually be
useful. Pets could be more practical overall if they were just higher level
right?
2 huge thumbs up to Expel Undead, Steelskin, and Vampiric Curse too...
Although I stopped playing my DESK at 30 in favor of my wizard, he's looking
more appealing to play every day now... phew
